leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-结构预测与评估生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预测→精修→对齐→质量评估→可视化
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 推理框架 + 结构工具 + 可视化

unit.unit_name: 结构精修/能量最小化/优化

tools.name: GOLF
tools.one_line_profile: Gradual Optimization Learning Framework for Conformational Energy Minimization
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning-based framework designed for conformational energy minimization of molecular structures, utilizing a gradual optimization strategy to navigate the energy landscape effectively.

tools.name: DSP
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel optimization solver for structured mixed-integer programming
tools.detailed_description: An open-source parallel optimization solver designed for structured mixed-integer programming (MIP) problems, often used in scientific modeling and operations research.

tools.name: AlphaPPImd
tools.one_line_profile: Generative neural network for exploring protein-protein complex conformational ensembles
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based generative neural network approach to explore and sample the conformational ensembles of protein-protein complexes, aiding in the study of protein dynamics and interactions.

tools.name: GromacsWrapper
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for GROMACS molecular dynamics tools
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that wraps system calls to GROMACS tools into thin classes, facilitating the automation and scripting of molecular dynamics simulations and analysis workflows.

tools.name: MDPOW
tools.one_line_profile: Calculator for water/solvent partition coefficients using GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate water/solvent partition coefficients (log P) using molecular dynamics simulations with GROMACS, automating the setup and analysis of free energy calculations.

tools.name: ATOMRefine
tools.one_line_profile: 3D equivariant graph transformer for all-atom protein structure refinement
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning method utilizing 3D equivariant graph transformers to perform all-atom refinement of protein tertiary structures, improving the quality of predicted models.

tools.name: DeepRefine
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning for protein complex structure refinement
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework designed for the refinement and quality assessment of protein complex structures, leveraging spatial information to optimize inter-subunit interactions.

tools.name: compas-FoFin
tools.one_line_profile: Rhino plugin for structural form finding using force-density and dynamic relaxation
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Rhino/Grasshopper that performs form finding for tension/compression structures using constrained force-density and dynamic relaxation solvers, applicable in structural engineering and architectural geometry.

tools.name: DuIvyTools
tools.one_line_profile: Processing and visualization tool for GROMACS MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit to process and visualize the results of molecular dynamics simulations performed with GROMACS, aiding in trajectory analysis and data interpretation.

tools.name: gromacs_copilot
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based assistant for running GROMACS simulations
tools.detailed_description: An interface that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to assist users in setting up and running molecular dynamics simulations with GROMACS.

tools.name: Colvars
tools.one_line_profile: Collective variables library for molecular simulation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A software module for molecular simulation programs (like NAMD, LAMMPS, VMD) that provides a flexible and high-performance implementation of collective variables for enhanced sampling and free energy calculations.

tools.name: MAGEMin
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Mineral Assemblage Gibbs Energy Minimization package
tools.detailed_description: A parallelized software package for calculating equilibrium mineral assemblages by minimizing Gibbs free energy, used in computational thermodynamics and geochemistry.

tools.name: RoseTTAFold2-PPI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for protein-protein interaction screening
tools.detailed_description: A fast deep learning-based method for predicting the structures of protein-protein complexes and screening for interactions on a large scale.

tools.name: DiffPack
tools.one_line_profile: Torsional Diffusion Model for Protein Side-Chain Packing
tools.detailed_description: A generative model based on torsional diffusion for autoregressive packing of protein side-chains, used for structure refinement and reconstruction.

tools.name: SOG-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Sum-of-Gaussians Neural Network for machine learning force fields
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight neural network framework (SOG-Net) for constructing machine learning force fields that integrate long-range interactions, suitable for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: psfgen
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced structure building tool for NAMD
tools.detailed_description: A standalone and Python-enhanced version of the psfgen tool from NAMD, used for generating protein structure files (PSF) and building molecular systems for simulation.

tools.name: raster-tiles-compactcache
tools.one_line_profile: Library for ArcGIS Compact Cache V2 raster tile format
tools.detailed_description: A library to read and write the Compact Cache V2 format used by ArcGIS for storing raster tiles, facilitating efficient access to geospatial data.

tools.name: BAT.py
tools.one_line_profile: Binding Affinity Tool for absolute and relative free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated Python tool for performing absolute and relative binding free energy calculations on protein-ligand systems using AMBER or OpenMM.

tools.name: Swarm-CG
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic parametrization of bonded terms in MARTINI CG models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the automatic parametrization of bonded terms in MARTINI-based coarse-grained molecular models using Fuzzy Self-Tuning Particle Swarm Optimization.

tools.name: py-MCMD
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid MD/MC simulation setup for NAMD and GOMC
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to create and manage hybrid Molecular Dynamics / Monte Carlo (MD/MC) simulations using NAMD and GOMC, supporting various ensembles like NVT, NPT, and GCMC.

tools.name: AToM-OpenMM
tools.one_line_profile: Alchemical Transfer Method framework for OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: An OpenMM-based framework for performing absolute and relative binding free energy calculations using the Alchemical Transfer Method (ATM).

tools.name: openmm-atmmetaforce-plugin
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMM plugin for Alchemical Transfer Potential
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for OpenMM that implements the Alchemical Transfer Potential, enabling specific types of free energy calculations within the OpenMM environment.

tools.name: GromPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the GROMACS molecular simulation package
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interface to the GROMACS molecular dynamics simulation package, allowing users to interact with and control GROMACS simulations via Python scripts.

tools.name: Longbow
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for automating simulations on remote HPC machines
tools.detailed_description: Longbow is a tool designed to automate the submission and management of biomolecular simulations on remote High Performance Computing (HPC) resources, mimicking local execution for ease of use.

tools.name: gromacs-fda
tools.one_line_profile: Force Distribution Analysis (FDA) for GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A modification of the GROMACS simulation engine to perform Force Distribution Analysis (FDA), allowing researchers to detect and analyze signal propagation and stress in biomolecular systems.

tools.name: gromacs-ramd
tools.one_line_profile: Random Acceleration Molecular Dynamics in GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Random Acceleration Molecular Dynamics (RAMD) method within GROMACS, used for enhanced sampling to identify ligand exit pathways and characterize binding kinetics.

tools.name: ParaMol
tools.one_line_profile: Package for Parametrization of Molecular Mechanics Force Fields
tools.detailed_description: ParaMol is a Python package designed for the parametrization of molecular mechanics force fields, specifically optimizing force field parameters to match quantum mechanical data or experimental properties.

tools.name: gmxtools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of tools and scripts for GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility scripts and tools to assist with GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations, including pre-processing, post-processing, and analysis tasks.

tools.name: StructuredOptimization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Structured optimization library in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for solving structured optimization problems, often used as a solver backend for scientific modeling, signal processing, and inverse problems.

tools.name: Molly.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular simulation library in Julia
tools.detailed_description: Molly.jl is a pure Julia package for molecular dynamics simulation, designed to be differentiable and extensible, suitable for scientific research in statistical mechanics and biophysics.

tools.name: NLPModels.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Data Structures for Optimization Models
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package defining data structures for Non-Linear Programming (NLP) models, serving as a foundation for optimization solvers used in scientific computing.

tools.name: PaCS-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized software utilities for PaCS-MD and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit providing optimized software utilities for Parallel Cascade Selection Molecular Dynamics (PaCS-MD) and subsequent trajectory analysis, facilitating enhanced sampling studies.

tools.name: visualdynamics
tools.one_line_profile: Web Platform for automating GROMACS simulations
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform built with Python and NextJS to automate the workflow of GROMACS simulations, making molecular dynamics setup and execution more accessible.

tools.name: cgenff_charmm2gmx
tools.one_line_profile: Convert CGenFF stream files to GROMACS format
tools.detailed_description: A Python script developed by the Lemkul Lab to convert CHARMM General Force Field (CGenFF) stream files into GROMACS compatible topology formats, facilitating the use of CHARMM force fields in GROMACS.

tools.name: panedr
tools.one_line_profile: Reads Gromacs EDR file to populate a pandas dataframe
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that parses GROMACS energy (EDR) files and loads the data directly into pandas DataFrames for easy analysis and plotting.

tools.name: pytim
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for the interfacial analysis of molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: Pytim is a Python package based on MDAnalysis for the identification and analysis of fluid interfaces in molecular simulations.

tools.name: AttnPacker
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for protein side-chain packing
tools.detailed_description: AttnPacker is an end-to-end deep learning method for protein side-chain packing, capable of predicting side-chain coordinates directly from the backbone structure.

tools.name: matcher
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for understanding chemical structure optimization problems
tools.detailed_description: Matcher is a web application and tool built around the mmpdb platform to analyze structure-activity relationships (SAR) and understand how chemical structure optimization problems have been solved in large datasets.

tools.name: gamd-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Accelerated Molecular Dynamics (GaMD) in OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Gaussian Accelerated Molecular Dynamics (GaMD) for the OpenMM simulation toolkit, enabling unconstrained enhanced sampling and free energy calculations.

tools.name: SeparatedTopologies
tools.one_line_profile: Free energy calculations with GROMACS using separated topologies
tools.detailed_description: Tools and scripts for performing free energy calculations in GROMACS using the 'separated topologies' approach, facilitating relative binding free energy studies.

tools.name: SolvationToolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for setting up solute-solvent mixtures for simulation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for generating arbitrary solute-solvent mixtures and setting up molecular dynamics simulations for engines like GROMACS, Amber, and OpenMM.

tools.name: off-ffcompare
tools.one_line_profile: Compare molecular structures after energy minimization
tools.detailed_description: A tool to compare molecular structures and energies after minimization with different force fields, useful for force field validation and comparison.

tools.name: mmelemental
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of the MMSchema specification
tools.detailed_description: Provides fundamental models and data structures for molecular mechanics based on the MMSchema specification, facilitating interoperability between molecular simulation tools.

tools.name: lindemann
tools.one_line_profile: Calculate Lindemann index of LAMMPS trajectory
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to calculate the Lindemann index from LAMMPS simulation trajectories, used to analyze phase transitions and melting in materials and molecular systems.

tools.name: Delete
tools.one_line_profile: Universal structure-directed lead optimization tool for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A universal structure-directed lead optimization tool designed to assist in the modification of chemical structures to improve their properties as drug candidates.

tools.name: openmm-mcp-server
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server interface for OpenMM molecular dynamics platform
tools.detailed_description: Provides a structured communication interface (Model Context Protocol) for task submission, management, and execution of OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations, facilitating integration with AI agents or other systems.

tools.name: STORMM
tools.one_line_profile: Structure and TOpology Replica Molecular Mechanics engine
tools.detailed_description: A molecular mechanics engine designed for high-performance simulations, focusing on structure and topology replication, suitable for advanced sampling and dynamics.

tools.name: Pyomo
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based open-source optimization modeling language
tools.detailed_description: An object-oriented algebraic modeling language for defining and solving diverse optimization problems, widely used in chemical engineering, process systems engineering, and scientific modeling.

tools.name: Hefei-NAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Ab-initio nonadiabatic molecular dynamics program
tools.detailed_description: A software package for performing ab-initio nonadiabatic molecular dynamics simulations, enabling the study of excited state dynamics and electron-phonon coupling.

tools.name: chemshell-QMMM-protein-setup
tools.one_line_profile: Setup scripts for QM/MM simulations of metalloproteins
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts to facilitate the setup of QM/MM calculations for metalloproteins using GROMACS, Chemshell, and ORCA, handling the complex interface between classical and quantum mechanics regions.

tools.name: JMolecularEnergy
tools.one_line_profile: Java library for force fields, MD, and QSAR calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Java library designed for calculating molecular force fields, performing molecular dynamics simulations, and conducting Quantitative Structure-Activity Relationship (QSAR) analysis.

tools.name: g_mmpbsa
tools.one_line_profile: MM-PBSA free energy calculation tool for GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate binding free energies using the MM-PBSA (Molecular Mechanics Poisson-Boltzmann Surface Area) method from GROMACS molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: RoseTTAFold
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based protein structure prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A software package containing deep learning models and scripts for RoseTTAFold, enabling high-accuracy protein structure prediction and design.

tools.name: Rosetta
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive software suite for macromolecular modeling
tools.detailed_description: The premier software suite for modeling and analysis of protein structures, including de novo structure prediction, enzyme design, molecular docking, and structure refinement.

tools.name: trRosetta2
tools.one_line_profile: Improved deep learning models for protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: Repository containing the second generation of trRosetta deep learning models for predicting protein inter-residue geometries and structures.

tools.name: ACFCalculator
tools.one_line_profile: Autocorrelation function calculator for molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate autocorrelation functions from time series data generated by molecular simulation codes like NAMD, useful for analyzing dynamics and relaxation properties.

tools.name: NNP-MM
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for TorchANI Neural Network Potentials with NAMD
tools.detailed_description: Scripts and tools to interface TorchANI neural network potentials with the NAMD molecular dynamics engine, enabling ML-driven MD simulations.

tools.name: PySAGES
tools.one_line_profile: Python Suite for Advanced General Ensemble Simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based suite for performing advanced sampling simulations (like metadynamics) in molecular dynamics, interfacing with engines like OpenMM and HOOMD-blue.

tools.name: SSAGES
tools.one_line_profile: Software Suite for Advanced General Ensemble Simulations
tools.detailed_description: A C++ based engine for advanced sampling in molecular dynamics, designed to work as a wrapper around various MD codes (LAMMPS, GROMACS, etc.) to perform free energy calculations and rare event sampling.

tools.name: MCSCE
tools.one_line_profile: Monte Carlo Side Chain Entropy calculator
tools.detailed_description: A package for generating side chain packing for fixed protein backbones and calculating side chain entropy using Monte Carlo methods.

tools.name: GMXvg
tools.one_line_profile: Python tool for plotting GROMACS XVG files
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility to parse and plot data from XVG files generated by GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations, facilitating data visualization.

tools.name: CrySPR
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure pre-relaxation and prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface for crystal structure pre-relaxation and prediction using machine-learning inter-atomic potentials, aiding in materials discovery.

tools.name: TIES_MD
tools.one_line_profile: Binding free energy calculations using TIES protocol
tools.detailed_description: A Python package built on NAMD/OpenMM to perform binding free energy calculations using the Thermodynamic Integration with Enhanced Sampling (TIES) protocol.

tools.name: MMO
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Mechanics library in OCaml
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing molecular mechanics algorithms and data structures in the OCaml programming language.

tools.name: gmx_MMPBSA
tools.one_line_profile: End-state free energy calculations tool for GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool based on AMBER's MMPBSA.py for performing end-state free energy calculations (MMPBSA/MMGBSA) using GROMACS trajectory files.

tools.name: biostitch
tools.one_line_profile: Image stitcher for Opera Phenix HCS System
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to stitch microscopy images generated by the Opera Phenix High-Content Screening System, facilitating the analysis of large-scale biological imaging data.

tools.name: PolymerAssembler
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for constructing atomistic 3D polymer models
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for the quick construction of atomistic 3D polymer models based on probabilistic Markov models, preparing them for molecular mechanics simulations.

tools.name: CADD-Scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for virtual screening and protein relaxation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts for performing virtual screening, cross docking, and protein structure relaxation using Schrödinger and Rosetta software suites.

tools.name: Hefei-NAMD-DEV
tools.one_line_profile: Development version of Hefei-NAMD program
tools.detailed_description: The development repository for Hefei-NAMD, an ab initio non-adiabatic molecular dynamics program for investigating ultrafast dynamics in materials.

tools.name: SPHinXsys
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-physics simulation library based on Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics
tools.detailed_description: SPHinXsys is a C++ library for engineering simulation and optimization, focusing on complex systems driven by fluid, structure, and multi-body dynamics using a unified computational framework.

tools.name: HPRO
tools.one_line_profile: Hamiltonian Projection and Reconstruction to atomic Orbitals
tools.detailed_description: HPRO is a tool for projecting and reconstructing Hamiltonians to atomic orbitals, useful in quantum chemistry and electronic structure analysis.

tools.name: YAMACS
tools.one_line_profile: YASARA plugins for GROMACS integration
tools.detailed_description: A collection of plugins for the YASARA molecular modeling software to interface with GROMACS, facilitating molecular dynamics setup and analysis.

tools.name: PackDock
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based side chain packing for protein-ligand docking
tools.detailed_description: PackDock utilizes a diffusion model to perform side chain packing specifically tailored for flexible protein-ligand docking tasks.

tools.name: OpenABC
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMM implementation of coarse-grained protein models
tools.detailed_description: OpenABC provides OpenMM implementations for several coarse-grained models including MOFF, MRG-CG, and HPS, facilitating efficient biomolecular simulations.

tools.name: CHAPERONg
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for GROMACS MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: CHAPERONg is a shell-based automated pipeline designed to streamline GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations and trajectory analyses.

tools.name: acpype
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Antechamber topology generation
tools.detailed_description: Acpype is a tool based on Python to use Antechamber to generate topologies for chemical compounds for a variety of molecular dynamics engines like GROMACS and CHARMM.

tools.name: BindFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for FEP and MM/PBSA calculations with GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: BindFlow is a Snakemake-based workflow designed to automate Free Energy Perturbation (FEP) and MM(PB/GB)SA calculations using GROMACS.

tools.name: emopt
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization suite for electromagnetic structures
tools.detailed_description: Emopt is a suite of tools for optimizing the shape and topology of electromagnetic structures using adjoint methods and Maxwell's equations solvers.

tools.name: BOCS
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization of Combinatorial Structures
tools.detailed_description: BOCS is an algorithm and tool for Bayesian optimization over combinatorial structures, frequently applied in biological sequence design and protein engineering.

tools.name: MDBenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark generator and analyzer for molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: MDBenchmark is a tool to quickly generate, start, and analyze performance benchmarks for molecular dynamics simulations (e.g., GROMACS, NAMD).

tools.name: pdbremix
tools.one_line_profile: PDB analysis and molecular dynamics trajectory tool
tools.detailed_description: pdbremix is a library and toolset for analyzing PDB files, setting up molecular dynamics simulations, and analyzing resulting trajectories.

tools.name: OpenMM-Python-Force
tools.one_line_profile: Interface to define OpenMM forces using Python
tools.detailed_description: This tool allows users to define custom forces for OpenMM simulations using pure Python code, enabling rapid prototyping of new potential energy functions.

tools.name: cctbx_project
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Crystallography Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: The Computational Crystallography Toolbox (cctbx) is a comprehensive library for the processing and analysis of crystallographic data, widely used in structural biology.

tools.name: martinize.py
tools.one_line_profile: Script to generate Martini coarse-grained topologies for GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A Python script used to create coarse-grained Martini input files (topologies and structures) for GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations starting from atomistic PDB files.

tools.name: openmmtools
tools.one_line_profile: Batteries-included toolkit for OpenMM molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools, integrators, and utilities for the OpenMM molecular simulation engine, providing enhanced functionality for sampling and simulation setup.

tools.name: perses
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for alchemical free energy calculations using OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing alchemical free energy calculations to explore chemical space, utilizing expanded ensembles and OpenMM for simulation.

tools.name: torsionfit
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian parameterization of molecular mechanics torsion parameters
tools.detailed_description: A toolset for fitting molecular mechanics torsion parameters to quantum chemical data using Bayesian inference methods.

tools.name: YANK
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated alchemical free energy calculation framework
tools.detailed_description: An open, extensible Python framework for performing alchemical free energy calculations, optimized for GPU acceleration via OpenMM.

tools.name: StreamD
tools.one_line_profile: Automated high-throughput molecular dynamics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated pipeline for running high-throughput molecular dynamics simulations, facilitating large-scale simulation studies.

tools.name: ufedmm
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Free Energy Dynamics implementation for OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Unified Free Energy Dynamics (UFED) for enhanced sampling and free energy calculations within the OpenMM simulation engine.

tools.name: cryo_fit
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for fitting atomic structures into cryo-EM maps
tools.detailed_description: Source code for cryo_fit, a tool used to fit and refine atomic models into cryo-electron microscopy density maps, typically associated with the Phenix software suite.

tools.name: DeepMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and MD
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed to generate many-body potential energy representations for molecular dynamics simulations, enabling high-accuracy simulations with ab initio quality.

tools.name: PhaseForge
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for alloy phase diagram prediction using ML potentials
tools.detailed_description: A framework for high-throughput prediction of alloy phase diagrams, integrating machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) with ATAT and CALPHAD modeling.

tools.name: Uni-GBSA
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for MM/GB(PB)SA free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: An automatic workflow designed to perform MM/GBSA and MM/PBSA calculations, handling force field building, structure optimization, and free energy estimation.

tools.name: SubPEx
tools.one_line_profile: Weighted ensemble path sampling for binding pocket exploration
tools.detailed_description: SubPEx (Sub-Pocket Explorer) uses weighted ensemble path sampling and molecular dynamics simulations to accelerate the sampling of binding pockets for ensemble virtual screening.

tools.name: Q2MM
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum to Molecular Mechanics parameterization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for deriving molecular mechanics force field parameters from quantum mechanical data, facilitating the development of accurate force fields.

tools.name: grand
tools.one_line_profile: Grand Canonical Monte Carlo water sampling for OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for performing Grand Canonical Monte Carlo (GCMC) insertions and deletions of water molecules within OpenMM simulations.

tools.name: FAHBench
tools.one_line_profile: Folding@home GPU performance benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark tool designed to measure the performance of GPUs for molecular dynamics simulations using the Folding@home core.

tools.name: Chemozart
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based 3D molecule editor and visualizer
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application for editing and visualizing 3D molecular structures, including molecular mechanics calculators.

tools.name: NAMD-xtb-QMMM-interface
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for NAMD and xTB QM/MM simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface enabling QM/MM simulations by coupling the NAMD molecular dynamics engine with the xTB semi-empirical quantum chemistry package.

tools.name: eABF-analyzer-for-NAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tool for eABF simulations in NAMD
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing 1D extended Adaptive Biasing Force (eABF) simulations performed with NAMD.

tools.name: mcmp-lbm
tools.one_line_profile: 3D multicomponent multiphase lattice Boltzmann solver
tools.detailed_description: A 3D multicomponent multiphase lattice Boltzmann solver implementing a Multi-Relaxation-Time collision scheme and a sparse storage structure for fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: ThermoNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for predicting protein thermodynamic stability changes
tools.detailed_description: A computational method for quantitative prediction of the impact of single-point mutations on protein thermodynamic stability using an ensemble of deep 3D convolutional neural networks.

tools.name: trRosetta
tools.one_line_profile: Protein inter-residue geometry prediction from sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A package to predict protein inter-residue geometries (distance and orientation) from sequence data, often used as constraints for structure prediction.

tools.name: molgym
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning environment for molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A framework for Reinforcement Learning for Molecular Design guided by Quantum Mechanics, enabling the generation of molecules with optimized properties.

tools.name: AlphaFold
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art protein structure prediction system
tools.detailed_description: The official open source implementation of AlphaFold 2, an AI system developed by DeepMind that predicts a protein's 3D structure from its amino acid sequence with high accuracy.

tools.name: Grappa
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learned Molecular Mechanics force field
tools.detailed_description: A machine learned Molecular Mechanics force field designed for integration into GROMACS and OpenMM, aiming to improve simulation accuracy.

tools.name: GROMACS
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance molecular dynamics simulation toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A versatile package to perform molecular dynamics, i.e. simulate the Newtonian equations of motion for systems with hundreds to millions of particles.

tools.name: pdb-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Dependency-free tools for manipulating PDB files
tools.detailed_description: A swiss army knife for PDB files, providing a set of dependency-free, cross-platform tools for manipulating and analyzing PDB structure files.

tools.name: harmslab-pdbtools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for manipulating wwPDB macromolecule structure files
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for manipulating and performing calculations on wwPDB macromolecule structure files, distinct from the haddocking/pdb-tools set.

tools.name: GRO2LAM
tools.one_line_profile: GROMACS to LAMMPS simulation converter
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert molecular dynamics simulation files from GROMACS format to LAMMPS format, facilitating interoperability between simulation engines.

tools.name: DeepAccNet
tools.one_line_profile: Protein model accuracy evaluator using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for estimating the accuracy of protein structure models and predicting residue-wise errors.

tools.name: ommprotocol
tools.one_line_profile: Command line launcher for OpenMM MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A command line application designed to simplify and standardize the launching of molecular dynamics simulations using the OpenMM engine.

tools.name: gromacs_ff
tools.one_line_profile: Trusted force field files for GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A collection of validated and trusted force field parameter files for use with the GROMACS molecular dynamics simulation package.

tools.name: ohana
tools.one_line_profile: Population structure and admixture history inference tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for mixture classification, constraint optimization, outlier detection, population structure analysis, admixture history inference, and selection detection.

tools.name: pycgtool
tools.one_line_profile: Coarse-grained model generator from atomistic trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate coarse-grained molecular dynamics models and parameters automatically from atomistic simulation trajectories.

tools.name: moltemplate
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform molecule builder for LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A general cross-platform tool for preparing simulations of molecules and complex molecular assemblies, primarily for the LAMMPS simulation engine.

tools.name: PyBerny
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular structure optimizer
tools.detailed_description: A molecular structure optimizer that implements the Berny algorithm for geometry optimization in computational chemistry.

tools.name: gmxapi
tools.one_line_profile: Python API for GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python interface for the GROMACS molecular dynamics simulation engine, allowing for flexible simulation workflows and integration.

tools.name: interfaceff2gro
tools.one_line_profile: Script to prepare GROMACS inputs with INTERFACE forcefield
tools.detailed_description: A Python script designed to prepare GROMACS input files utilizing the INTERFACE force field parameters.

tools.name: OPLSAA-DB
tools.one_line_profile: Database of OPLS-AA parameters and topologies
tools.detailed_description: A database containing hand-built OPLS-AA force field parameters and topologies for various molecules, compatible with multiple simulation engines like OpenMM, GROMACS, and NAMD.

tools.name: OpenMM-MD
tools.one_line_profile: Script for running OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose script for setting up and running molecular dynamics simulations using the OpenMM toolkit.

tools.name: OpenThermo
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular thermochemistry property calculator
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ program for calculating molecular thermochemistry properties (Gibbs free energy, enthalpy, entropy, heat capacities) from quantum chemistry output files.

tools.name: PyAutoFEP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Free Energy Perturbation (FEP) workflow for GROMACS
tools.detailed_description: PyAutoFEP is an automated workflow designed to streamline Free Energy Perturbation (FEP) calculations using GROMACS. It integrates enhanced sampling methods to improve the efficiency and accuracy of free energy estimation in molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: tr-rosetta-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of trRosetta for protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of trRosetta and trDesign, packaged for convenient use in protein structure prediction and design tasks. It allows researchers to leverage the trRosetta architecture within the PyTorch ecosystem.

tools.name: DiffAb
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based generative model for antibody design and optimization
tools.detailed_description: DiffAb is a diffusion-based generative model designed for antigen-specific antibody design and optimization. It focuses on generating and optimizing protein structures, specifically antibodies, to improve binding affinity and specificity.

tools.name: ComplexMixtures.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of solute-solvent interactions in complex mixtures
tools.detailed_description: ComplexMixtures.jl is a Julia package for performing minimum-distance distribution analyses to characterize complex solute-solvent interactions in molecular dynamics simulations. It provides tools to understand solvation shells and structural properties of mixtures.

tools.name: posebusters_em
tools.one_line_profile: Energy minimization routine for PoseBusters benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A standalone Python tool for performing energy minimization on protein-ligand poses. It serves as the post-processing step in the PoseBusters benchmarking suite to ensure physical plausibility of generated molecular structures.

tools.name: AFEM
tools.one_line_profile: Approximate Free-Energy Minimization in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of approximate free-energy minimization techniques using PyTorch. This tool allows for differentiable optimization of free energy landscapes, useful in statistical mechanics and molecular modeling.

tools.name: pro-1
tools.one_line_profile: Reasoning model for protein stability prediction
tools.detailed_description: A reasoning model trained using GRPO (Group Relative Policy Optimization) targeting the Rosetta REF2015 energy function. It is designed to predict and optimize protein stability.

tools.name: Svirl
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated solver for Ginzburg-Landau equations
tools.detailed_description: Svirl is a GPU-accelerated library for solving complex Ginzburg-Landau equations, primarily used in superconductivity research. It includes a time-dependent solver for vortex dynamics and a free energy minimizer for finding static configurations.

tools.name: MIFit
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive graphics application for molecular modeling and refinement
tools.detailed_description: MIFit is a cross-platform interactive graphics tool designed for molecular modeling, fitting, and refinement of protein structures derived from X-ray crystallography data.

tools.name: rna-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for RNA sequence, structure, and simulation analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox for analyzing RNA sequences, secondary and tertiary structures, and simulation data. It is widely used in the RNA research community, including RNA CASP and RNA Puzzles.

tools.name: PyBindE
tools.one_line_profile: MMPBSA calculations for protein-protein/ligand systems
tools.detailed_description: PyBindE facilitates Molecular Mechanics Poisson-Boltzmann Surface Area (MMPBSA) calculations to estimate binding free energies in protein-protein and protein-ligand systems.

tools.name: NAMD (NBCR Mirror)
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel, object-oriented molecular dynamics code
tools.detailed_description: NAMD is a parallel molecular dynamics code designed for high-performance simulation of large biomolecular systems. This repository serves as a mirror/distribution source for the NAMD codebase.

tools.name: DLPacker
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning based protein side-chain packing
tools.detailed_description: DLPacker is a deep learning-based tool for predicting protein side-chain conformations (packing). It reconstructs full-atom protein structures from backbone coordinates with high accuracy.

tools.name: relax
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular dynamics by NMR data analysis
tools.detailed_description: The 'relax' software package is designed for the analysis of molecular dynamics using experimental NMR data. It supports a wide range of theories and models for studying protein dynamics.

tools.name: bgmol
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular mechanics systems and simulation data for ML
tools.detailed_description: bgmol provides a collection of molecular mechanics systems, energy models, and simulation data, specifically tailored for developing and benchmarking machine learning methods in molecular physics.

tools.name: OpenAWSEM
tools.one_line_profile: AWSEM coarse-grained protein folding forcefield in OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: OpenAWSEM is an implementation of the AWSEM (Associative memory, Water mediated, Structure and Energy Model) coarse-grained forcefield using the OpenMM toolkit. It enables efficient simulation of protein folding and aggregation.

tools.name: OpenFF Evaluator
tools.one_line_profile: Physical property evaluation toolkit for force fields
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for automating the estimation of physical properties from molecular simulation data. It is designed to assist in the parameterization and validation of molecular force fields.

tools.name: OpenFF Interchange
tools.one_line_profile: Interchange format for molecular mechanics data
tools.detailed_description: A library for storing, manipulating, and converting molecular mechanics data between different software ecosystems (e.g., OpenMM, GROMACS, LAMMPS), facilitating interoperability in MD simulations.

tools.name: OpenFF Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for SMIRNOFF force field parameterization
tools.detailed_description: The Open Forcefield Toolkit provides tools for applying SMIRNOFF format force fields to molecular systems. It handles chemical perception and parameter assignment for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: OpenMM
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance toolkit for molecular simulation on GPUs
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for molecular simulation using high performance GPU code. It acts as a library, an application, and a platform for implementing new algorithms.

tools.name: OpenMM-ML
tools.one_line_profile: High-level API for integrating ML models into OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: Allows users to use machine learning models (like neural network potentials) within OpenMM simulations easily.

tools.name: OpenMM-PLUMED
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMM plugin for PLUMED integration
tools.detailed_description: Provides a connection between OpenMM and PLUMED, enabling enhanced sampling and free energy calculations.

tools.name: OpenMM-Setup
tools.one_line_profile: GUI application for configuring OpenMM simulations
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application for preparing and configuring molecular dynamics simulations to be run with OpenMM.

tools.name: OpenMM-TensorFlow
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMM plugin for defining forces with TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: Allows defining forces and potential energy functions using TensorFlow neural networks within OpenMM simulations.

tools.name: OpenMM-Torch
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMM plugin for defining forces with PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: Allows defining forces and potential energy functions using PyTorch models within OpenMM simulations.

tools.name: openmmforcefields
tools.one_line_profile: Force field management for OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: Provides AMBER and CHARMM force fields for OpenMM, including support for small molecules via GAFF/OpenFF.

tools.name: PDBFixer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for fixing problems in PDB files
tools.detailed_description: Automatically fixes common problems in PDB files, such as missing atoms, non-standard residues, and missing hydrogens, to prepare them for simulation.

tools.name: cg2at
tools.one_line_profile: Coarse-grain to atomistic conversion tool
tools.detailed_description: Converts coarse-grained molecular models back to atomistic resolution, useful for multi-scale modeling workflows.

tools.name: AeroSandbox
tools.one_line_profile: Aircraft design optimization and aerodynamics toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for aircraft design optimization, leveraging automatic differentiation for fast aerodynamics, propulsion, and structural analysis.

tools.name: MM4
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular mechanics simulator for nanotechnology
tools.detailed_description: A molecular mechanics simulator implemented in Swift, targeting molecular nanotechnology applications.

tools.name: ProtoCaller
tools.one_line_profile: Automation for relative binding free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to automate relative protein-ligand binding free energy calculations using GROMACS.

tools.name: qrefine
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum Refinement Module for crystallography
tools.detailed_description: A module for crystallographic structure refinement that integrates quantum mechanical calculations to improve geometry.

tools.name: pynamd
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for analyzing NAMD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools for processing and analyzing output from NAMD molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: do_x3dna
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of DNA/RNA structures in MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool to analyze fluctuations in DNA or RNA structures in molecular dynamics trajectories, wrapping 3DNA functionality.

tools.name: Reduce
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for adding and correcting hydrogens in PDB files
tools.detailed_description: A program for adding hydrogens to a Protein Data Bank (PDB) molecular structure file. It optimizes the orientation of Asn, Gln, and His sidechains.

tools.name: iPBSA
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for minimizing docked conformations and calculating binding free energy using MM/PBSA
tools.detailed_description: iPBSA minimizes docked receptor-ligand conformations in implicit solvent and calculates the binding free energy with MM/PB(GB)SA methods. It wraps AmberTools to facilitate these calculations.

tools.name: gromacs_py
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for simplified GROMACS MD simulation setup and execution
tools.detailed_description: Gromacs_py is a python library allowing a simplified use of the gromacs MD simulation software. It can build topologies, create simulation systems, and run minimisation, equilibration, and production runs.

tools.name: SEEKR2
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-Enabled Estimation of Kinetic Rates
tools.detailed_description: SEEKR2 is a program for calculating receptor-ligand binding kinetics and thermodynamics using molecular dynamics and milestoning theory.

tools.name: PEGgenerator
tools.one_line_profile: Topology generator for PEG polymers in GROMACS and LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate PEG (Polyethylene glycol) topology files for molecular dynamics simulations in GROMACS and LAMMPS formats.

tools.name: NMRforMD
tools.one_line_profile: Calculation of NMR relaxation times from MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A python script for the calculation of NMR relaxation time T1 and T2 from molecular dynamics trajectory files.

tools.name: mlmm_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: ML/MM hybrid calculator for enzymatic reaction investigation
tools.detailed_description: Machine-Learning / Molecular-Mechanics (ML/MM) hybrid calculator and CLI toolset for Mechanistic Investigation of Enzymatic Reactions.

tools.name: simple-simulate-complex
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow scripts for protein-ligand simulation with OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and workflows to perform simple protein-ligand complex simulations using OpenMM, serving as a practical tool for simulation setup.

tools.name: FASPR
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate protein side-chain packing tool
tools.detailed_description: FASPR is a fast, accurate, and deterministic protein side-chain packing algorithm and tool.

tools.name: TTClust
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for clustering molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: TTClust is a python program to clusterize molecular dynamic trajectories from various software (amber, gromacs, charmm, namd, pdb).

tools.name: protocolGromacs
tools.one_line_profile: Automated GROMACS simulation protocol
tools.detailed_description: Automatic gromacs protocol from preparation to production with ligand parametrization.

tools.name: PHEnix
tools.one_line_profile: SNP calling pipeline for public health genomics
tools.detailed_description: Public Health England SNP calling pipeline for genomic analysis.

tools.name: RoseTTAFold2NA
tools.one_line_profile: Protein/nucleic acid complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: RoseTTAFold2NA is a deep learning tool for predicting the structures of protein-nucleic acid complexes.

tools.name: tmol
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable molecular scoring library
tools.detailed_description: TMol is a library for differentiable molecular energy scoring and optimization, developed by the Institute for Protein Design.

tools.name: gibbs
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Gibbs free energy minimization
tools.detailed_description: An open source python library for equilibrium calculation based on global minimization of Gibbs free energy.

tools.name: VOTCA
tools.one_line_profile: Coarse-graining and charge transport simulation package
tools.detailed_description: VOTCA is a software package for coarse-grained molecular dynamics and charge transport simulations.

tools.name: drMD
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Dynamics setup tool for experimentalists
tools.detailed_description: drMD is a tool designed to simplify the setup and execution of molecular dynamics simulations, aimed at experimentalists.

tools.name: OpenMMDL
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for OpenMM protein-ligand simulation setup
tools.detailed_description: OpenMMDL provides an interface to OpenMM for easy setup of molecular dynamic simulations of protein-ligand complexes.

tools.name: MXMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Mechanics-Driven Graph Neural Network for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that integrates molecular mechanics with graph neural networks (GNNs) to predict molecular properties and simulate structures, specifically designed to capture both local and global structural information.

tools.name: AMBER (zj-zhang)
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Modelling for Biological Evidence-based Research
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to automate the modeling process for biological evidence-based research, facilitating systematic reviews and meta-analyses in bioinformatics and evidence synthesis.

tools.name: MVN-AFM
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-View Neural 3D Reconstruction for Atomic Force Microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A neural network-based tool for reconstructing 3D micro- and nanostructures from Atomic Force Microscopy (AFM) data, utilizing multi-view learning techniques to enhance imaging resolution and structural fidelity.
